  • Classes in de.gnwi.jdpd.accumulators used by de.gnwi.jdpd.utilities
    Class
    Description
    ForceAccumulator
    Force accumulator that uses (and changes) the particle related arrays ParticleArrays.getF_x/getFtwo_x, ParticleArrays.getF_y/getFtwo_y and ParticleArrays.getF_z/getFtwo_z for accumulative ("+=" and "-=") operations.
    PotentialAccumulator
    Potential accumulator that uses ExtendedAdderGroup instance for accumulative ("+=") operations.
